description: This file defines a JiraTools class that provides methods to interact with Jira issues, including retrieving, creating, searching, and commenting on issues. It initializes a Jira client using credentials or environment variables and exposes several methods for Jira operations.

classes.name: JiraTools
classes.description: A class that provides methods to interact with Jira, including issue retrieval, creation, search, and commenting.

methods.name: get_issue
methods.description: Retrieves details of a Jira issue given its key and returns a JSON string with issue information.

methods.name: create_issue
methods.description: Creates a new Jira issue with specified project key, summary, description, and issue type, returning a JSON with the new issue's key and URL.

methods.name: search_issues
methods.description: Searches for Jira issues matching a JQL query and returns a JSON list of issue summaries, statuses, and assignees.

methods.name: add_comment
methods.description: Adds a comment to a specified Jira issue and returns a JSON indicating success or error.
